org.springframework.boot.autoconfigure.jdbc

Class DataSourceProperties

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.boot.autoconfigure.jdbc.DataSourceProperties
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.springframework.beans.factory.Aware, org.springframework.beans.factory.BeanClassLoaderAware, org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean

    @ConfigurationProperties(prefix="spring.datasource")
public class DataSourceProperties
extends Object
implements org.springframework.beans.factory.BeanClassLoaderAware, org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean
    Base class for configuration of a data source.
    Since:
    1.1.0
    Author:
    Dave Syer, Maciej Walkowiak, Stephane Nicoll, Benedikt Ritter, Eddú Meléndez

      • getJndiName

        public String getJndiName()

      • setJndiName

        public void setJndiName(String jndiName)
        Allows the DataSource to be managed by the container and obtained via JNDI. The URL, driverClassName, username and password fields will be ignored when using JNDI lookups.
        Parameters:
        jndiName - the JNDI name
